text: Route 214 is a short collector road in the Canadian province of Nova Scotia. It is located in Hants County and connects Elmsdale at Trunk 2 with Lower Nine Mile River at Trunk 14. ==Communities along Route 214== *Elmsdale *Belnan *Upper Nine Mile River ===Local roads served=== *Garden Road *Elmbel Road == Businesses== *Petro Canada *Esso *Sobeys *Wilsons Gas Stops *Atlantic Superstore *McDonald's ==See also== *List of Nova Scotia provincial highways ==References== Category:Nova Scotia provincial highways Category:Roads in Hants County, Nova Scotia
title: Nova Scotia Route 214
